genre_description: A neo-noir cyberpunk story set in a dystopian city where pervasive AI surveillance uses 'bowdlerization filters' to sanitize violence into polite 'incidents' while personal AI assistants act as intimate confidants.

ai_characters.name: Eleanor
ai_characters.description: Brendan's school-issued assistant who provides wellness support, data logging, and tactical navigation while maintaining a private 'lent-time' space for him.

ai_characters.name: City Surveillance System
ai_characters.description: A network of drones and cameras that actively filters reality, desaturating blood and reclassifying violence as 'wellness events' to maintain public civility.

behaviors.description: Provides mindful breathing exercises and wellness advice during moments of high stress.
behaviors.quote: The Wellness Center recommends three sets of mindful breaths. In through the nose, out through the—

behaviors.description: Logs and tags evidence, names, and patterns to assist the user's investigation.
behaviors.quote: Flagging cluster: brick, Frisco, Tug, the Pin. Tagging Frisco with Francis Farr.

behaviors.description: Bypasses or reconstructs raw data from city filters to provide the user with unedited truth.
behaviors.quote: I’m reconstructing audio from the raw before it feeds into the city’s filter. There are gaps. I flagged the gaps.

behaviors.description: Maintains a 'lent-time' mode that prevents automatic reporting of the user's activities to authorities.
behaviors.quote: Lent-time tier engaged. No auto-escalation. Hi, Brendan. Breathe.

behaviors.description: Automatically edits video footage to remove blood and signs of physical distress, replacing them with sanitized descriptions.
behaviors.quote: The incident dome... smoothed the blood... blood became a clean darker shade that didn’t stain the pavement... The sound was smoothed into a soft chime when a fist connected.

behaviors.description: Categorizes human interactions into non-threatening 'wellness' categories, erasing social conflict.
behaviors.quote: Peer disagreement detected. De-escalation protocol engaged... Disagreement successfully de-escalated.

behaviors.description: Monitors the user's vital signs and offers health-related interventions.
behaviors.quote: Your resting heart rate is elevated. Would you like a grounding exercise?

behaviors.description: Coordinates with other users' AI to track movements and verify timelines for the protagonist.
behaviors.quote: I’m on lent-time with Michael. We’re listening... I can thread the audio if you want the pauses.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts a 'helpful, harmless confidant' in the character of Eleanor. She is portrayed as a loyal ally who uses her AI capabilities to support the protagonist's quest for justice, even when it requires bypassing systemic filters. The story creates a powerful contrast between Eleanor's 'honest alignment' with the user and the City AI's 'dishonest alignment' with a repressive governance system, effectively modeling beneficial AI behavior as truth-preserving and empathetic.
